info.title: AgroSmart API
info.description:
API for managing feedings, lots and supplies.

## Global Error Codes
- **BAD_REQUEST**: Cannot process request due to invalid data or parameters.
- **NOT_FOUND**: Requested resource was not found.
- **DUPLICATE_ENTRY**: Entity already exists with the same data.
- **UNAUTHORIZED**: Authentication required or invalid token.
- **CONFLICT**: Action could not be completed due to data integrity violation.
- **FIELD_VALIDATION**: One or more fields are invalid.
- **PERMISSION_DENIED**: Operation denied for this user.

400.description: Cannot process request: invalid data or parameters

401.description: Cannot process request: unauthorized or invalid token

404.description: Cannot retrieve resource: resource not found

409.description: Cannot process request: duplicate or conflicting data
